about_the_game:
Join a band with two crass, potty-mouthed punks, Ricki and Max. What else do you have going on Tuesday nights? Curate your style, endure the trials and tribulations of public transit, and play dead-end gigs! Go on mediocre dates, thrift with your besties, buy overpriced coffee, and complain about the cost of rent in this Seattle-inspired grungy city. Punk Juice invites you to recreate your life… Only worse!

WHAT KIND OF PUNK ARE YOU?


Fully customize your character from their hair to their socks! Your punk reflects whatever inner rebel lies within you. Stay up to date with the latest fashions, shop for "new" clothes at the thrift store, and befriend new styles from your friends.

PLAY DEAD-END GIGS


Unravel an overarching narrative where every decision you make decides your fate. Play rhythm mini games to make a name for yourself in the music scene, be it rivals, friends, or new connections. Go on adventures with your bandmates to build your friendships and unlock extra pieces of the story.

SKATE AROUND & EXPLORE THE CITY


Check out every nook and cranny that makes up the unique neighborhoods in Punk Juice. You'll find new places, quests, and friends in every hot spot.

GO ON MEDIOCRE DATES


Who knows what relationships blossom on your adventure? Will you make new friends, keep it casual, or flirt with the enemy...


Additional Features
  • Upgrade your gear at the music shop
  • Decorate your apartment with furniture and trinkets from the thrift store
  • Explore a Seattle-inspired grungy city on your skateboard or roller skates
  • Work your dead-end job to earn some extra cash... or don't, we're not your boss
